Hello, I'm Stefan Karaferovic.

I'm a full stack web developer.

ABOUT ME

Full stack web developer and Computer Science student with a strong math and algorithmic background, highly driven and well-versed in RESTful architecture. Passionate about Web development and Software engineering. You can find me on , or on .

Development Experience

stefan_dev ~ $

Interests

I'm very passionate about anything that has to do with technology, especially Web development and Software engineering. My hobbies include watching and playing sports (mostly football and basketball), being outdoors, weight lifting, and reading up on anything tech. In my free time you'll probably find me watching movies, listening to music, or hanging out with my friends.

PROJECTS

These are some of my projects, you can find all of them on my

To Do list

To Do list app built for assignment as part of the curriculum for the JavaScript course on The Odin Project.

Features: Create new lists, Edit lists, Drag and drop lists, Create new tasks (from popup and quick task), Edit tasks, View task info, Mark task as finished, Drag and drop todo tasks, Print list tasks

JavaScript, CSS3, HTML5, Webpack, Git and ESlint were used in the making of this project.
Libraries used: SortableJS, date-fns.

Restaurant site

Restaurant site built for assignment as part of the curriculum for the JavaScript course on The Odin Project.

Site has home page (slogan & working hours), menu page (dishes names and prices & dish image shown on hover and click), contact page (restaurant contact and contact form to send message) and about page (story about restaurant history).

CSS3, HTML5, JavaScript, Webpack, ESlint & Git were used in the making of this project.

Tic-Tac-Toe

Tic Tac Toe game built for assignment as part of the curriculum for the JavaScript course on The Odin Project.

It can be played in two modes:
Single-player (vs AI player implemented with Minimax Algorithm)
Multiplayer (vs another player)

Built with: JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3 & Git.

Etch A Sketch

Etch A Sketch app built for assignment as part of the curriculum for the Web Development 101 course on The Odin Project.

You can draw anything you like with colors that you choose.
Color options: *
Selected color
Grayscale
Rainbow

Built with: JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3 & Git.

Calculator

An online Calculator built for assignment as part of the curriculum for the Web Development 101 course on The Odin Project.

Built with:
JavaScript
CSS3
HTML5
Git

Library

Library app to store books that you read or want to read

Features:
Add new book to library
Remove book
Toggle read status
Sort books by name or read status

Built with: JavaScript, CSS3, HTML5 & Git.
